attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically the government is charging us to  pay as our relatives suffer. Our relatives have already paid their taxes throughout their life and therefore we should not have to pay again for what they have rightfully gained throughout their life. After the death of a relative this detracts from the grief of a loved one, with a taxman knocking on the door.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
